text: 'iin aladhin yakfurun biallah warusulih min alyhwd walnasaraa, wayuridun 'an yufariquu bayn allah warusulih bi'ana yuminuu biallah wayukadhibuu rusulah aladhin 'arsilahum 'iilaa khalqihi, 'aw yaetarifuu bisidq bed alrusul dun buedan, wayazeamuu ann bedhm aftarau ealaa rbbihm, wayuridun 'an yatakhidhuu tryqana 'iilaa aldalalat alty 'ahdathuha walbideat alty abtadaeuha
